lines.text: I want more than just sex.
That's why God invented television.
When are you gonna do something with your life?
What, like you? Work at a job I hate and fuck women I can't stand.
Fuck you, it's a life!
Not the kind of life I want.
Why is everything so fucking hard?
Not everything, just the important stuff.
Same old bullshit! Every day I just go to work, meet a girl, get laid, dump her.
Excuse me. I have to go try on everything I own.
Do you ever feel like you're nothing like anyone else in the world?
Only all the time.
Somewhere there's one person waiting for me... feeling like me.
A lot of people in the world feel like that.
Sometimes I think there's something wrong with me.
I've never met anyone born after 1965 who wasn't incomplete somehow.
Why is that?
Microwave ovens, I think.
Some people have a problem with gays and lesbians.
Yeah, well some people wear polyester.
I can't picture you as a dyke.
PLEASE... I'd be a lesbian!
